title: Alone in Paradise
description: Stranded on the newly-discovered moon she calls Paradise and with no way of calling for help, Anna Foster struggles to survive in the untamed wilderness while trying to find a way back to human-controlled space.While she adapts to the new environment, Anna stumbles across some of the moonâ€™s hidden secrets and quickly discovers that she is not as alone as she originally believed.
author: Patrick Stutzman
